verse.name: c1
verse.lines: For Jesus is my Savior newline He paid my debt on Calv'ry's mountain; newline I'm happy in His wondrous love newline I'm drinking, yes, newline I'm drinking at the fountain.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A robe of white, a crown of gold, newline A harp, a home, a mansion fair; newline A victor's palm and joy untold, newline Are mine when I get there.
